TopicTitle: RPM initialization error please check config

Articles.Content:
So i used the bdmk22 mod with Aset Props and the latest version of RPM [raster Prop Monitor] and im getting {Raster Prop Monitor: initialization error please check config }

I fixed one part of it which was the HUD but the monitors wont load up, and the sounds for alarms and altitude meter wont make any noise they only light up.
i have that same problem and i can't figure it out but how did you get the hud to work

10 minutes ago, coyotepunk05 said:

i have that same problem and i can't figure it out but how did you get the hud to work

i did my research in the ksp Log and found that Aset props was missing bdSwTumble from it so i ..............yadah yadah yadah............ put the txt file in the place
How do I solve this problem, I also have it
